title: Can Google India give a chance to students who are aware of technology but haven't done a B.Tech? - Quora
tags: Bachelor of Technology Degrees in India

response.answer_text: NO. They cannot do this because of two reasons: They do not need such skilled software engineers in India because they do not do their software engineering in India. They only do their easy-clerical business/IT works in India. Praveen Kumar Singh's answer to How do I apply for an internship at Microsoft (India Development Center)? I want to apply off-campus, as Microsoft does not visit our campus for internships or recruitment.If they start doing this then it would kill the engineering entrance exam coaching industry in India, the owners of which are also the shareholders of such companies. Skilled software engineers can always work for Google/Amazon/Microsoft-USA, through this method: Praveen Kumar Singh's answer to How can I apply for abroad jobs? Which consultancy in India provides such platform?
